alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 3:31PM CDT until June 14 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Autauga County in central Alabama... Lowndes County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Dallas County in south central Alabama... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 331 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tyler, or 7 miles east of Selmont-West Selmont, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Selma, Fort Deposit, Mosses, Hayneville, Selmont-West Selmont, Autaugaville, White Hall, Gordonville, Lowndesboro, Benton, Beechwood, Gardner Island, Tyler, Old Cahaba Park, Dallas County Horse Arena, Mulberry, Belknap, Dallas Lake, Logan and Memorial Stadium. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central and south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
